citations.narrative:
The facility is conducting regulated activity with out a valid USDA license. Facility Representatives confirmed that the
auction had conducted regulated activity as recently as 14-June-2024. The facility has brokered regulated animals during
a weekly online auction. The regulated species that were brokered are sugar gliders, hedgehogs, fox, coyote, opossums,
and skunk.
Operating without a valid license impedes the ability of APHIS officials to ensure adequate welfare for the animals in the
facility. No person shall operate as a dealer, exhibitor, or operator of an auction sale, without a valid license.
No regulated activity, to include the exhibition or sale of regulated animals, can be conducted until a USDA license has
been obtained.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Facility Representative.
Additional Inspectors:
Eric Irvin, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.1(a)(1) 
   
Requirements and application. 
The facility is conducting regulated activity with out a valid USDA license. Facility Representatives confirmed that the 
auction had conducted regulated activity as recently as 14-June-2024. The facility has brokered regulated animals during 
a weekly online auction. The regulated species that were brokered are sugar gliders, hedgehogs, fox, coyote, opossums, 
and skunk.  
 
Operating without a valid license impedes the ability of APHIS officials to ensure adequate welfare for the animals in the 
facility. No person shall operate as a dealer, exhibitor, or operator of an auction sale, without a valid license. 
 
No regulated activity, to include the exhibition or sale of regulated animals, can be conducted until a USDA license has 
been obtained. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Facility Representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Eric Irvin, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

species.common: RED FOX (INCLUDES SILVER FOX & CROSS FOX)
